channel.title: Prayer glitch
channel.description: im on normal prayer at the moment about to change to turmoil when i gonig change to turmoil i can right click on piety or witch ever one i want to and then wait till i change to turmoil still have the right click on piety then activate it when i on turmoil and it works while i have turmoil on.. so you can say i can use piety + turmoil at the same time... any one know how to fix this problem..
